original_title: Nationwide power outage due to a system issue – CEB
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Ceylon Electricity Board has confirmed an islandwide power outage.
CEB Spokesperson Noel Priantha said the power outage occurred owing to a system issue.
He added that steps are being taken to restore the situation as soon as possible.
“Budget 2024 was mainly on Cricket, Opposition had nothing to criticize” – President
